mapper.sql: sid, sname, employee_id, sparentid, saddress, stprice, sdescribe, stime, sadvice, scomment, savailable
mapper.select: select * from station s,employee e where s.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and s.sid=e.station_id
select * from station s left join employee e on s.employee_id=e.eid where s.sid=#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into station (sname, employee_id, sparentid, saddress, stprice, sdescribe, stime, sadvice, scomment, savailable) values (#{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sparentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sadvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{savailable,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update station
sname = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sparentid = #{sparentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
saddress = #{saddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stprice = #{stprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sdescribe = #{sdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stime = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sadvice = #{sadvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scomment = #{scomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
savailable = #{savailable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update station set sname = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sparentid = #{sparentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, saddress = #{saddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stprice = #{stprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sdescribe = #{sdescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stime = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sadvice = #{sadvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scomment = #{scomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, savailable = #{savailable,jdbcType=INTEGER} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from station s left join employee e on s.employee_id=e.eid
select * from station s left join employee e on e.station_id=s.sid

SELECT * FROM station s left join employee e on s.employee_id=e.eid
and sname like concat('%',#{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and saddress like concat('%',#{saddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select * from station s left join employee e on s.employee_id=e.eid order by s.stime desc
